_header: It fell six days before the pase
_description: Gospel for Monday after Palm Sunday, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: It fell sex dais bifor þe paseWhen iews þaire solempne festes mase…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat power in him had þai nanevnto þe tyme he wald be tane
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Ante sex dies pasche & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica in ramis palmarum ut supra in dominica i aduentus domini fferia ii proxima secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 65rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.157-164.
